description.en:
JINGGA DAN SENJA Tari and Ari accidentally meet during a school ceremony. Ari is attracted to Tari and does everything he can to get close to her. It turns out that their names are similar, because Tari and Ari were both born at sunset. However, both of them have very opposite personalities. Tari is brave and always cheerful, but stubborn. Meanwhile, Ari was a delinquent who often participated in brawls. "Wars" often occur between them, because Tari considers Ari rude and pretentious. The situation gets hotter when Angga starts to approach Tari. The boy is from another high school who is the archenemy of their school. However, Angga suddenly stopped approaching Tari. Tari's relationship with Ari is also getting strained. What's going on?

(Source: Gramedia Online, translated)
description.id:
JINGGA DAN SENJA Tari dan Ari tidak sengaja bertemu saat upacara di sekolah. Ari tertarik pada Tari dan melakukan segala cara untuk mendekati si adik kelas. Ternyata nama mereka mirip, karena Tari dan Ari sama-sama lahir saat matahari terbenam. Tetapi, keduanya memiliki pribadi yang sangat bertolak belakang. Tari pemberani dan selalu ceria, tapi keras kepala. Sedangkan Ari cowok berandalan yang sering ikut tawuran. “Perang” pun sering terjadi di antara mereka, karena Tari menganggap Ari kasar dan sok penting. Situasi makin panas ketika Angga mulai mendekati Tari. Cowok itu dari SMA lain yang merupakan musuh bebuyutan sekolah mereka. Tetapi, tiba-tiba Angga berhenti mendekati Tari. Hubungan Tari dengan Ari juga makin renggang. Ada apakah?

(Sumber: Gramedia Online)
